pageContext.claim: “One in three women are sexually assaulted on the journey up from Honduras or Guatemala or El Salvador. ”
pageContext.analysis: This statistic comes from Doctors Without Borders, which interviewed 56 women for a report in 2017 and found that 31.4 percent were “sexually abused” on the journey; 10.7 percent were raped. But the figure was not based on a random sample and thus is not representative of the entire migrant population traveling through Mexico.
